title: Deposit into the compliance resolution fund
context: [ยง431:2-410] Deposit into the compliance resolution fund. All moneys that have been recovered by the department of commerce and consumer affairs as a result of prosecuting insurance fraud violations pursuant to this part, including civil fines, criminal fines, administrative fines, and settlements, but not including restitution made pursuant to section 431:2-404, 431:2-405(b)(1), or 431:2-408, shall be deposited into the compliance resolution fund established pursuant to section 26-9(o). [L 2009, c 149, pt of ยง2]
